backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining products, categories, carts, orders, user profiles, and admin‑protected marketplace operations with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old marketplace/order structures to the new schema adding accepted/declined statuses.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and shared UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: UI help card explaining how admins can add products and required fields.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Provides login/logout UI and a user dropdown with profile and admin options based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content and displays a sign‑in prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/cart/MobileCartS: Displays a floating mobile-only cart button showing item count and navigating to the cart.
frontend/src/components/checkout/DemoPay: Renders a card explaining that the payment process is a demo with no real transactions.
Shows input panels for COD, UPI, or card payments and validates input per method.
frontend/src/components/checkout/demoPay: Simulates asynchronous demo payment processing via a timed promise.
Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears demo transaction IDs using session storage.
frontend/src/components/checkout/DemoPay: Provides payment method selection and displays the corresponding validation panel.
frontend/src/components/checkout/demoPay: Contains validation helpers for UPI, card number, expiry, CVV, and cardholder name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, routed content, profile setup, and mobile cart UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays the footer with dynamic year and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderBar: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, links, cart badge, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/marketplace/Cate: Fetches and displays product categories with loading and error states, allowing users to select a category.
frontend/src/components/marketplace/Prod: Renders a clickable product card with image, title, category badge, and price, navigating to the product page.
Displays a responsive grid of ProductCards with skeletons, error handling, and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides cart data by combining cart items with products and exposes mutations for adding, updating, and removing items.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user profile and determines admin status using the backend actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, and identity loading via AuthClient within a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, categories, orders, and related admin actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSellerPage.tsx: Admin-only page for managing products, bootstrap admin creation, and viewing order tabs with edit/add dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart with quantity updates, removal, subtotal, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Multi-step checkout flow handling address entry, review, simulated payments, and placing orders.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details and optional transaction reference after checkout.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists the authenticated user's past orders with status badges and totals.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Shows product details, description, pricing, and allows adding a chosen quantity to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: React profile page allowing users to view principal ID, edit name, and save profile with loading and copy-to-clipboard states.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Storefront page displaying products with category filtering, search, and an initialization hook for marketplace setup.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility for formatting numbers as INR currency with zero decimal places.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing architecture, issues, and existing feature versions for a Meesho-like marketplace.
